TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIScrollViewDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

Docs.summary: Indicates that deceleration relating to a scroll event has ended.

Scroll view where the content finished scrolling.
if the scrolling movement will continue (but decelerate) after the user lifts their finger. If then the scrolling stops immediately upon touch-up.
